overview: The Internet of Things (IoT) course introduces learners to the technologies, tools, and methodologies for building connected devices. From understanding sensors and actuators to cloud integration and data analytics, this course equips students with the skills needed to design, deploy, and manage IoT solutions for real-world applications.
courseDetails: In this course, you will learn the fundamentals of IoT systems, including hardware, software, and network communication protocols. You'll explore how sensors and actuators work, how to build IoT projects using microcontrollers like Arduino or Raspberry Pi, and how to integrate IoT devices with cloud platforms for data storage and analysis. The course emphasizes hands-on experience, guiding you through projects that bring IoT concepts to life.
certification: Upon completing this course, you will receive a certificate, qualifying you as an IoT Developer.
